attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When taxpayers money was used to bail out Northern rock we (the taxpayers) had no say in the decision - but now, when without paying back the loans Northern Rock intends to hand bonuses to its staff.  Taxpayers should determine if this should be allowed

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
